thread.title: Uber rape: Cab driver convicted
thread.title_full: Uber rape: Cab driver convicted - Moneylife

author: IANS
title: Uber rape: Cab driver convicted
text: A court here on Tuesday convicted Uber driver Shiv Kumar Yadav for raping a woman executive on the night of December 5, 2014 in the cab she hired to head back home in Delhi's Inderlok area.   According to the police, Yadav drove the woman to an isolated place and raped her.
